website_summaries.verdict: With a 3-gallon size in this bucket, most people can carry it easily.
pros: These HDPE materials are able to store either liquids or solids
Multiple ribs at the top of the bucket mean it will maintain its shape
Because it's shorter than the standard 5-gallon bucket size, it can fit into tight spaces where other buckets won't fit
Includes a sturdy metal handle on the top to simplify carrying it
cons: This bucket does not consist of food safe materials

customer_reviews.title: Buck It
customer_reviews.text: Its a bucket. If you need a bucket, buy it. If you don't need a bucket, then you need to reevaluate your life and get a bucket. This bucket solves many problems. Need gallons of water? This bucket can hold that. Need a bucket of flowers after your partner found out you binged watched Stranger Things without them? This bucket can do that. Have a chocolate syrup addiction and need a close by supply at all times? This bucket can hold GALLONS of chocolate syrup. Your welcome.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: I had a use for a shorter bucket than the ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a use for a shorter bucket than the normal 5gal big box bucket but I wanted the same strength and construction. This bucket is that. Same quality as Menards or Home Depot buckets, just shorter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonder

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sized bucked.
customer_reviews.text: Used for 50' heavy duty extension cord, that I could not keep coiled and untagled. But now all works well with a small hole cut in bottom to feed end to power outlet. Other endfeed from top and re coils nicely back in bucket. And also can use bucket with cord in it to carry drill or jig saw. Seen on a dyi show.
customer_reviews.author: T.L.H.

customer_reviews.title: How do you mess up a bucket?
customer_reviews.text: You make it out of some sort of plastic that emits a terrible disgusting odor, and you make a bucket that if you rub it with a cloth has the color come off onto the cloth.
customer_reviews.author: 人

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I use this bucket to sit on when repairing car wheels. works perfect for that and the other day I found a turtle in the middle of the road and it saved the turtle. Nice sized bucket to keep in the back of my SUV for odd purposes other than to sit on. Cheap too.
customer_reviews.author: 4runner

customer_reviews.title: VERY CHEAP!!
customer_reviews.text: This bucket didn't last 1 month before it cracked on the bottom of the bucket. Funny thing is I didn't see anything around me to make it crack. I was thawing my BBQ ribs in the bucket and added water and it would feel up due to crack in the bottom. CHEAP BUCKET DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.author: Jerry J.

customer_reviews.title: Versitile and compact
customer_reviews.text: The product came on time in a well-fitting box with protective wrap. There was a small flat area on the side but that made it easier to drill the hole for the intake/drain tube. I like the more compact and less heavy three gallon for growing shallow rooted and dwarf plants although I still use five gallon buckets for big and tall tomatoes. It is currently being used for my indoor baby beet experiment. These buckets are very versatile and can be used for tasks such as changing out solutions and storing nutrients and mixes.
customer_reviews.author: REC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size cast net bucket for all you fisherman
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size cast net bucket for all you fisherman. Needed something that had the width profile of a 5 gallon bucket but a bit shorter so that it cleared the hatch lid on our boat. This fit the bill perfectly and has held up well despite being subjected to saltwater after months.
customer_reviews.author: CameronC

customer_reviews.title: rip off
customer_reviews.text: it says your buying ten but you only get one. this hydro farm company must be making a fortune selling10 packs that only contain one piece
customer_reviews.author: Robert Nuss

customer_reviews.title: Hydrofarm Bucket, 3-gallon
customer_reviews.text: Okay - I bought to use as a short composting toilet to fit under my camp cot, but the lid I ordered didn't fit so I'm going to have to use a taller bucket I already had and leave it out. The opening is wider than a 5 gallon bucket. Other than that, it seems good quality.
customer_reviews.author: KittyLover

customer_reviews.title: Great For Portable A/Cs
customer_reviews.text: I own a wheeled air conditioner that drips a ton of water from a tube which unfortunately cannot be emptied by window. Smaller buckets would get full in a hour, and during the hot summer months, who wants to get up every hour to empty a bucket? In the meantime your A/C has to be off, or else it'll get water on the floor. This is perfect for holding a ton of water. I only had to empty it every few days, and when you have a busy job the little things that save chores can be so nice.
customer_reviews.author: M. L.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These are good buckets , and the shipping was decent . Just little sad that they are so pricy compared to the store I use to shop when I lived in TX. But definitely would buy from this company agsin
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty bucket.
customer_reviews.text: Used for growing Green Peppers.. cucumber.. and peas. All indoors in a hydroponic garden. Works as expected. Heavy duty bucket. Will order more.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Bucket cracks, poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bucket for a hydro setup and once I started to make the necessary holes, the bucket would crack instead of holding strong. I had to fix with duct tape to prevent leakage. Very poor material.

It appears to be the same circumference a 5 gal would be, which is what I wanted.

customer_reviews.title: Hydrofarm HG5G 5-Gallon Black Bucket
customer_reviews.text: Lowest rating I have ever given and that is because this bucket is so over priced. Its just a black bucket; nothing special about it, not heavy duty, not even branded with a company logo. Yes, it will hold water or whatever you want to carry in it. Concerning the rings at the top, they're there as stiffeners, to make the bucket more stable. Now, if you live somewhere where availability of 5 gallon buckets is limited or nonexistent, or you can't get out and you have a real need for a black bucket, then this may be a reasonably priced bucket for you.

product_meta.title: Hydrofarm HG3G, Black, 3 Gallon Single Bucket, 3-Gallon
product_meta.description:
Style:Bucket| Size:3 gallon

Hydrofarm's 3 gallon black bucket. Buckets can be the true building blocks of your indoor hydroponics setup or outdoor garden. They're an ideal way to transport media, water, and other nutrients, as well as a collection receptacle for all your other accessories. From its sturdy construction to its strong carry handle, you'll find many reasons to tote this bucket. Available in multiple sizes. Made of HDPE, but not of foodsafe resin. All our polyethylene buckets are BPA free.

Ideal for building your own hydroponic system

Great for containing and transporting liquids and solids

Use as a reservoir in simple hydroponic systems

Steel carrying handle with ergonomic grip
feature_bullets: Great for containing and transporting liquids and solids
Ideal for building your own hydroponic system
Use as a reservoir in simple hydroponic systems
Steel carrying handle with ergonomic grip
Made of HDPE, but not of foodsafe resin. All our polyethylene buckets are BPA free

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars527 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
